refnamediv.refpurpose: returns the given loaded config variable value

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If no parameter is given, an array of all loaded config variables is returned.

example.title: getConfigVars()
example.programlisting:
<?php

// get loaded config template var #foo#
$myVar = $smarty->getConfigVars('foo');

// get all loaded config template vars
$all_config_vars = $smarty->getConfigVars();

// take a look at them
print_r($all_config_vars);
?>

refsect1.para: See also clearConfig(), {config_load}, configLoad() and getTemplateVars().
